data.title: CZ Refutes $30M ASTER Sale Rumor — Here’s What Really Happened
data.description:
CZ Refutes $30 Million ASTER Sale Rumor — Here’s What Really Happened: In a recent statement, CZ, the CEO of Binance, addressed the swirling rumors regarding a purported $30 million sale of ASTER, categorically denying the claims and providing clarity about the situation. Here's a detailed account of the events that transpired, the motivations behind the rumors, and the factual information that the community needs to understand the truth behind this controversial topic.
source: https://blocknews.com/cz-refutes-30m-aster-sale-rumor-heres-what-really-happened/

data.title: Bitcoin Network Remains Robust 17 Years After White Paper Release
data.description: According to PANews, U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent recently tweeted about the enduring strength of the Bitcoin network, 17 years after the release of its white paper. Bessent highlighted that the network continues to operate smoothly and is more robust than ever. He also suggested that Senate Democrats might learn from Bitcoin's resilience.

data.title: Musk: We will launch an instant messaging app called "X Chat" with "Bitcoin-like" encryption features.
data.description: In a podcast, Musk stated plans to launch a standalone instant messaging app called "X Chat" to compete with Telegram and WhatsApp, expected to launch in the coming months. "It uses a peer-to-peer encryption system, kind of like Bitcoin. The encryption is very good; we're doing full testing," Musk added, noting that it won't have any "ad-driven" content. He pointed out that competitors like WhatsApp "target ads based on your chat content." (Cointelegraph)

data.title: The USDC Treasury minted an additional 250 million USDC on the Solana blockchain.
data.description: According to Whale Alert monitoring, the USDC Treasury minted 250 million USDC on the Solana chain 2 minutes ago.

data.title: BitMine Receives Significant Ethereum Transfer from Galaxy Digital OTC
data.description: According to Foresight News, monitoring by Lookonchain has revealed that BitMine, an Ethereum DAT company, received a transfer of approximately 7,660 Ethereum from an address labeled as Galaxy Digital OTC. The transaction occurred early this morning, UTC+8.

data.title: Jensen Huang has sold over $1 billion worth of Nvidia stock since June.
data.description: Nvidia (NVDA.O) CEO Jensen Huang has sold over $1 billion worth of stock since June, completing a large-scale, pre-planned stock sale. A report on Friday showed that Huang recently sold 25,000 shares.

data.title: California regulators fined Bitcoin ATM operator Coinhub $675,000.
data.description: California regulators have fined Bitcoin ATM operator Coinhub $675,000 for violating digital asset laws. The fine includes $105,000 in restitution to California consumers who were charged more than permitted fees and charges when using cryptocurrency ATMs.

data.title: U.S. Lawmakers Discuss Expansion of Cryptocurrency Regulations
data.description:
According to PANews, U.S. House Agriculture Committee Chairman Glenn 'GT' Thompson met with CFTC Acting Chair Caroline D. Pham on Thursday to discuss preparations for expanding cryptocurrency regulations next year. The discussions are part of efforts to draft new rules, with expectations that a market structure bill will be passed. Last week, Caroline D. Pham also met with Senate Agriculture Committee Chairman Senator John Boozman to discuss similar issues.

Previously, it was reported that the U.S. Senate Agriculture Committee is set to release a bipartisan draft related to the cryptocurrency market structure bill.

data.title: Vitalik sold off another batch of Meme tokens, cashing out 15,170 USDC.
data.description: According to Lookonchain, Ethereum founder Vitalik Buterin sold another batch of airdropped Meme tokens, cashing out 15,170 USDC. Previously, on October 30th, Vitalik sold 275 trillion Meme tokens (CAT) obtained from an airdrop, cashing out 14,216 USDC.

data.title: Bitmine added 112,960 ETH this week, worth $443 million.
data.description: According to EmberCN monitoring, Bitmine, the largest holder of Ethereum, received 7,660 ETH from Galaxy Digital 6 hours ago, worth $29.28 million. This week, Bitmine has increased its holdings by 112,960 ETH through BitGo, FalconX, Kraken, and Galaxy Digital, worth $443 million, at an average price of approximately $3,923.

data.title: Crypto stocks closed higher across the board in the US market, with ALTS rising 9.57%.
data.description: According to data from msx.com, at the close of trading on the US stock market, the Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 0.09%, the S&P 500 rose 0.26%, and the Nasdaq Composite rose 0.61%. Cryptocurrency stocks generally rose, with ALTS up 9.57%, SBET up 8.38%, MSTR up 5.87%, and BMNR up 4.71%. msx.com is a decentralized RWA trading platform that has listed hundreds of RWA tokens, covering US stock and ETF tokens such as AAPL, AMZN, GOOGL, META, MSFT, NFLX, and NVDA.

data.title: Bitwise Updates XRP ETF Application with Key Details
data.description: According to Odaily, Bloomberg ETF analyst Eric Balchunas shared on the X platform that Bitwise has submitted the fourth revision of its XRP ETF application. This update includes information about the exchange, the New York Stock Exchange, and a management fee rate of 0.34%. Eric Balchunas noted that this step is typically one of the final stages in the application process.

data.title: Bloomberg: Coinbase plans to acquire BVNK for $2 billion to boost its new stablecoin business.
data.description: Sources familiar with the matter revealed that US cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase Global Inc. is in late-stage acquisition talks with stablecoin infrastructure startup BVNK, with a proposed transaction valued at approximately $2 billion, pending due diligence. Coinbase Ventures, Coinbase's venture capital arm, is one of BVNK's investors, and the deal is expected to close later this year or early next year. If the transaction is completed, Coinbase's revenue streams will no longer rely solely on transaction fees, and stablecoin usage will increase. (Bloomberg)

data.title: "A whale that won 14 times with large-scale openings" has suffered a floating loss of over $7 million on its long positions.
data.description: According to on-chain analyst Yu Jin, the "whale with 14 consecutive wins in large-scale openings" is still holding onto its positions, having made no trades in the past day or so. This whale currently holds long positions worth $367 million, with a current unrealized loss of $7.27 million.

data.title: Bitwise has updated its XRP ETF filing, adding information on the NYSE and a 0.34% management fee.
data.description: Bloomberg ETF analyst Eric Balchunas wrote on the X platform that Bitwise has updated its XRP ETF application documents for the fourth time. This revision adds information about the exchange (New York Stock Exchange) and a 0.34% management fee. Balchunas stated that this is typically one of the final steps in the application process.

data.title: Whale Investor Maintains Position Despite Losses
data.description: According to Odaily, blockchain analyst Yu Jin reports that the 'large-scale position whale,' known for winning 14 consecutive trades, has not made any moves in the past day. The whale currently holds a long position valued at $367 million, with an unrealized loss of $7.27 million.

data.title: Microsoft sees widening AI divide although adoption is faster than any other tech
data.description:
Tech giant, Microsoft says AI technology is spreading faster than any other technology ever but has also warned that not everyone will partake of this fast-growing technology. Billions of people across the world are going to be left out due to various reasons like language barriers and electricity availability, and fuel inequalities, as outlined in […]
source: https://www.cryptopolitan.com/microsoft-sees-widening-ai-gap/
